item.title: Getting Started
item.description: DexQL is a query language to query a dataset and create a dashboard from the data. It is based on Kusto Query Language. A DexQL script consists of statements that transform, filter, and summarise a data set. The statements are strung together by pipes similar to Unix pipes. Example # date steps 2023-01-01 15568 2023-01-02 12473 … … The example script below reads from the Steps table, filters out rows before 2023-01-01, adds a calculated field called months then sums up steps by month.
